Class ClientControllerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.state.ClientControllerState
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConnectedState, ConnectingState, TitleScreenState
public abstract class ClientControllerState extends Object
Abstract class representing a State of the ClientController.
